messages.subject: Re: [UnschoolingDiscussion] dumb homeschooling comment
messages.msgSnippet: ... Maybe she has a point.  Do you think he should pay you for being your young un s tutor ?  ;)  (with tongue firmly in cheek) Kathy PS:  I think your MIL is
messages.messageBody:
--- morninlaurie <morninlaurie@...> wrote:

> She says, "Well, you'll need the money to pay for
> the tutors."
>

Maybe she has a point. Do you think he should pay you
for being your young'un's 'tutor'? ;) (with tongue
firmly in cheek)

Kathy

PS: I think your MIL is a member of the same club as
my mother :) I'm almost to the point where I consider
it free entertainment rather than taking it as
personally as it is intended.

It's Good 2 B Dog Nutz!
http://www.good2bdognutz.com

__________________________________________________

messages.subject: dumb homeschooling comment
messages.msgSnippet: Dh says to his parents, We ve decided to homeschool our youngest. (She s 5, has 2 older siblings, 7 & 16, who don t want to homeschool.) His mom says to my
messages.messageBody:
Dh says to his parents, "We've decided to homeschool our youngest."
(She's 5, has 2 older siblings, 7 & 16, who don't want to homeschool.)
His mom says to my dd, (my mil is one to talk thru the kids instead
of to us) "Well, I guess Daddy will have to get a second job."
Dh asks, "What do you mean?" (I am a stay-at-home Mom.)
She says, "Well, you'll need the money to pay for the tutors."

huh?
I imagine this may be the first of many dumb things I will hear.

~~Laurie
